info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 12:24AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Perry, northwestern Garland, southeastern Scott, Yell and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1223 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oden, or 9 miles northwest of Mount Ida, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danville... Mount Ida... Oden... Mimosa... Gravelly... Fourche Valley... Plainview in Yell County... Mauldin... Muddy Creek WMA... Belleville... Havana... Avant... Corinth... Wing... Olio... Mt Tabor... Kingston... Fannie... Bluffton... Rover... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
